| History                 = The Brothers are a black prison gang active in the [[Cage (Prison)|Cage]] which is run by "Mo' Money", a former rap mogul who used superhumans against the competition who ended up in the Cage after a hip-hop rival was thrown out a 42nd story floor. The gang attempted to collect on the bounty put on the temporarily de-powered and incarcerated [[James Howlett (Earth-616)|Wolverine]] and the [[Henry McCoy (Earth-616)|Beast]] by the mutant hating Warden and guards.{{r|Wolverine Vol 2 164}}
